name: Relax VR
description:
Hello!

I dont know what this is, its a relaxing experience of flying through the sky in VR

explore the world. find a location that you think looks good, stop and take in the view

there is no objective in this game, nothing to do and progress, yet i find it enjoyable just beeing in the moment and breathing a bit.

this game also uses a unique controlling mathod. you only use the right controller, hold it with both hands, and sit in a rotating chair for the full expirience.

controls:

joystick: Move

trigger: Speed boost

Joystick press: Options

thanks and i hope you enjoy :)

(only tested on oculus quest 2...)
